text: So if they argue with you ˹O Prophet˺, say, “I have submitted myself to God, and so have my followers.” And ask those who were given the Scripture and the illiterate ˹people˺, “Have you submitted yourselves ˹to God˺?” If they submit, they will be ˹rightly˺ guided. But if they turn away, then your duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺. And God is All-Seeing of ˹His˺ servants
